page.title: 19 Amenities
page.content: I like our area of{Chandler's Ford} because there is a{Library}which you can go to. Lots of different{Shops} like butchers, toy shops, hardware stores, florists, supermarkets, dry cleaners, a record shop, china shop, fashion shop, fruit shop and estate agents. For children there are quite a few parks and playing fields. Also Brownie, Cubs,{Guides and Scouts meetings are held in local halls. There are 8 different{Schools.}Fryern, Hiltingbury, Merdon, Kings Road, Swithun Wells and Toynbee Secondary. Also 2{Private Schools,}Sherborne House and Woodhill. There are 5 Churches St.Boniface, United Reformed Church, St.John's North Baddesley, The Methodist Church and St.Martins. There are{pubs}and{restaurants}for the evening. There are also 5{petrol {stations.}
